CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . Pursuant to a decision of ORG of CARDINAL DATE the applicant began receiving a DATE single mother allowance in respect of her daughter who was born on DATE .
CARDINAL . In DATE , from DATE , the applicant received no payments .
On DATE the applicant brought proceedings before ORG of GPE районный суд города PERSON ) requesting the payment of outstanding sums .
CARDINAL . By a judgment of CARDINAL DATE the court allowed the applicant ’s claim and ordered ORG of ORG ( Волгоградское облфинуправление ) to pay the applicant MONEY ( RUR ) .

CARDINAL . Following the entry into force of the judgment , the court ’s bailiff instituted enforcement proceedings for recovery of the sum awarded to the applicant . However , the applicant was informed that in DATE the court judgment could not be enforced , because the defendant lacked sufficient funds .

CARDINAL . The applicant complained about the non - enforcement of the judgment to ORG of ORG ( ORG юстиции администрации PERSON области ) , which on DATE forwarded her complaint to the bailiff ’s service of the first instance court for reply and necessary measures .
In an undated letter of DATE , the bailiff ’s service informed the applicant that it had issued a writ of execution , but had not yet received from the defendant the sum due to the applicant .
CARDINAL . According to the ORG submissions , which were not contested by the applicant , the sum of ORG was paid to her twice – on DATE and on DATE .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL of LAW of DATE provides that a bailiff ’s order on the institution of enforcement proceedings must fix a time - limit for the defendant ’s voluntary compliance with a writ of execution . The time - limit may not exceed DATE . The bailiff must also warn the defendant that coercive action will follow , should the defendant fail to comply with the time - limit .
CARDINAL . Under LAW of the LAW , the enforcement proceedings should be completed within DATE of the receipt of the writ of enforcement by the bailiff .
